text_logic_form: The height of triangle $ACE$ is equal to the sum of the base of polygon $ACE$ and $5$ units.
The area of triangle $ACE$ is $52$ square units.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The height of triangle $ACE$ is equal to the sum of the base of triangle $ACE$ and $5$ units.
The area of triangle $ACE$ is $52$ square units.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $b+5$ units.
The length of the line $AE$ is $b$ units.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $E$.
The line $CB$ is perpendicular to the line $BE$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AE$, $CB$, $CE$, and $EB$ forming the triangle $ACE$.
The line $AB$ and $CE$ are the base of the triangle $ACE$.
